title: I've Seen Plenty of Talk About Azir and....
body: ...everyone seems to forget that there are only five people existing in the world that are aware that the slaves were freed and Azir is against slavery. Remember, Azir was destroyed minutes after freeing the slaves, as was most others. This means Azir, Sivir, Nasus, Renekton, and Xerath are the only ones aware of this. Everyone else just thinks that the emperor is back, and mind you, there were slaves. So no, Azir wasn't evil.

replies.body: Actually, probably only Xerath is aware of this

How?
Azir is aware (he actually did it)
Sivir is (Azir probably filled her in on everything)
Nasus and Renekton were both there too (they were guardians)

Azir obviously,
but

he may have not told Sivir

and Nasus and Renekton weren't there, Xerath specifically arranged for them to be in another place when the ceremony happened, they just arrived quick enough to trap him
They still would have known, but I'll admit that Sivir may not know.

How would they have known if they weren't there for the ceremony?

The only way for them to know is if Azir told Nasus and Xerath told Renekton
Super Important Note: Azir SAID he wanted to free the slaves.  He never did.
Didn't he make a public announcement minutes before the ceremony where he was "killed"?
He talked to Xerath and to few ones that withnessed the act. There wasn't a big speech if i remember.
i remember in his lore, the moment before xerath become ascended azor said slavery is freed.
I think Jaredan meant it in a way like "Azir said that all slaves will be free,but then everyone died before he made an actual law against slavery and spread the word to the other parts of shurima"
Was this changed from was is told in *Unbound*?
